name: 馬肇石
objective: 課程重點：藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構。
schedule:
class 1: basic into of self
class 2: je suis / je m appelle
class 3: phonetic system and numbers 1-20
class 4: basic intro: polite vous and nmbers 20-69
class 5: the family + numbers 70-100
class 6: etre + avoir + er verbs
class 7: introduction of le passe compose
class 8: telephon + family + weather
class 9: mid-term exam
class 10: time / places / directions
class 11: imparfait et les temps passes + resto + food
class 12: city in general + commerce
class 13: positions in space + commerce
class 14: aller + verb / venir de + verb
class 15: colors, shapes, materials
class 16: hotels and money
class 17: transporation: train / metro / car etc...
class 18: final exam
